items.sentence: Why didn\'t you tell us you were allergic to peanuts?
I can\'t even imagine what you must\'ve gone through.
Let\'s look around and see if anybody\'s in the park.
When was the last time that you cleaned your kitchen?
When was the last time you played an acoustic guitar?
Tom couldn\'t believe it was already time to go home.
Tom couldn\'t figure out what Mary was talking about.
I have an appointment with the dentist at 3 o\'clock.
How much money do I need to save before I can retire?
How much time do you spend studying French every day?
Every now and then I like to have hot and spicy food.
Everybody else at the party was much younger than me.
Everybody is in the basement watching the game on TV.
Everyone in the class has to learn the poem by heart.
I thought you said you\'d do that if I wanted you to.
Tom told me that you\'re the person I should talk to.
Tom and Mary agreed never to talk about the incident.
Tom and Mary are both married, but not to each other.
Tom doesn\'t know that Mary has spent time in prison.
Tom encouraged Mary to write a letter to her parents.
